title: The richest people in America as of 2019
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
There is a difference of 108.7 between the maximum Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and minimum Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
There is a difference of 108.7 between the maximum Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and minimum Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The maximum Net worth in billion U.S. dollars 131.0 is found at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and the minimum is found at Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) where Month is 22.3.
Second maximum Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is found at Month Bill Gates (Microsoft).
The minimum Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) has got 5.87 times less Net worth in billion U.S. dollars than the maximum Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com).

The Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars, followed by Bill Gates (Microsoft), and Warren Buffett (Berkshire Hathaway). Down to the Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) which is the lowest.
Over the past 20 Months, the Net worth in billion U.S. dollars has declined.
Month Charles Koch (Koch Industries), and David Koch (Koch Industries) have a similar Net worth in billion U.S. dollars that is 50.5.
The Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) has 2.52 times less Net worth in billion U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 1039.3.
